channel.title: Okay, need ONE error fixed and for coders its really simple so please help!

item.title: Okay, need ONE error fixed and for coders its really simple so please help!
item.dc:creator: @BACON555 BACON555
item.description:
@BACON555 wrote:

okay heres what im tryin to do im trying to make a code that when a new player logs in it kicks them so they HAVE a character file… then writes that name into the members.txt so i dont have to do it! lol, and heres the code.

} else if (ismember = 0) try { PlayerHandler.kickNick = p5.playerName; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Desktop/webblifescape/data/members.txt", true)); bw.write((playername+)); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("error while writing in members.txt!"); e.printStackTrace(); } return 0; } } }

and of course no code isnt without that 1 error lol,

client.java:3534: illegal start of expression bw.write((playername+)); 1 error finished! press any key to continue . . .

if you know what the error means and what i need to do please tell me so i can fix it! this is exciting lol i only have 1 error on a code i wrote… lol please help!

oh! and btw the little arrow thing is pointing to the first ) of this bw.write((playername+));[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2008, 05:30:57 PM[/size][hr]please help? i want this code perfected

Read full topic
